mapper.sql: id, username, password, name, phone, lineTel, age, gender, jobNumber, positionId, departmentId, code, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE eam_user
username = #{map.username},
password = #{map.password},
name = #{map.name},
phone = #{map.phone},
lineTel = #{map.lineTel},
age = #{map.age},
gender = #{map.gender},
jobNumber = #{map.jobNumber},
positionId = #{map.positionId},
departmentId = #{map.departmentId},
code = #{map.code},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM eam_user
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND username like CONCAT('%', #{username} , '%')
AND password like CONCAT('%', #{password} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone} , '%')
AND lineTel like CONCAT('%', #{lineTel} , '%')
AND age like CONCAT('%', #{age} , '%')
AND gender like CONCAT('%', #{gender} , '%')
AND jobNumber like CONCAT('%', #{jobNumber} , '%')
AND positionId like CONCAT('%', #{positionId} , '%')
AND departmentId like CONCAT('%', #{departmentId} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
